choices: You wake up to Danielle on top of you.
You wake up to Danielle staring at you, smirking.
You explore Danielle's body whilst she's asleep.
1.content: It's 2am in the morning and last night your parents left to go to New York city for 2 months. You stare up peacefully at the ceiling as you try to fall asleep next to your giantess sister Danielle. You lie there as you finally get to sleep, dreaming about how you can't wait to see what Danielle has in store for you tommorow.
1.title: Your sister in-law knows about your ability.

info.brief_description: You have the power to shrink to 5 inches, what is going to happen.
info.description:
You're are called Harvey and when you were 3 years old you shrunk to the size of 5 inches and ever since that day, his giantess sister has been very protective over him.

Danielle , 18, beautiful woman with dark brown hair and eyes with a curvy body figure. Huge sexy round butt, nice sized boobs, and a slim toned midsection. She loves her tiny brother and can be protective of him from strangers but she loves to humiliate and crush him like a tiny bug. Although she's hurtful and mean towards him at times she really does care about him and knows she goes to far sometimes but its just way to much fun sometimes.
